media.figcaption: Enjoy the natural beauty of the Cabrits National Park in Dominica © Courtesy of Cabrits Resort

media.alt: The pristine white interior of a hotel room at Punta Rucia lodge. There is a wooden bathtub to the upper left side of the room, a large flat-screen TV high on the wall, a woven mat and a well-made bed. The door of the room is open showcasing a view of trees along the beach.
media.figcaption: On an island filled with all-inclusive resorts, Punta Rucia provides a little respite from the crowds in the Dominican Republic © Courtesy of the Punta Rucia Lodge
